title: 开启服务器时崩溃
author: mayuanyi
txt_content:
本帖最后由 mayuanyi 于 2020-7-26 22:00 编辑 

活动代码页: 936
############################
       正在开启服务器
############################
Unrecognized VM option 'UseCompressedOops'
Did you mean '(+/-)CheckCompressedOops'?
Error: Could not create the Java Virtual Machine.
Error: A fatal exception has occurred. Program will exit.
############################
    服务器将在5秒后重启
############################

^C终止批处理操作吗(Y/N)?

大佬们能稍微详细说明一下怎么解决吗 ，谢谢

replies.author: WDN2MD
replies.txt_content:
java虚拟机问题
把开服bat里头java -XX:开头的东西去掉就ok惹

replies.author: mayuanyi
